summary:
Here is a summary of the text:

The film industry has various revenue streams, but box-office earnings are the main metric for success. War films, musicals, and historical dramas have traditionally been popular, but franchise films dominate in the 21st century. Superhero films, like Marvel's Avengers series, and Disney's animated films, have huge earnings. 'Gone with the Wind' remains the highest-grossing film of all time when adjusted for inflation. This article looks at the highest-grossing films and franchises, with Marvel, Disney, and Star Wars featuring prominently.
title: List of highest-grossing films
